name: Sudowoodo
author: Sumiyoshi Kizuki
flavor_text: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

abilities.name: Mimic
abilities.effect: As long as Sudowoodo is your Active Pokémon, it copies all of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks, including their costs. This power can’t be used if Sudowoodo is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
